description.value:
You've strengthened your body through practice drills and workouts, making sure not to waste a single drop of sweat in your quest for gains. You might be a champion fighting in arena matches, a hardcore gym rat, or a heavy hitter on a competitive sports teamâ€”what matters to you is the rush you get when you beat a personal record.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Strength or Dexterity, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the Athletics skill and the Sports Lore skill. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.feats.Item.Deadlift]{Deadlift} skill feat.
